example: Remove the [MPSC]{REG} from the [splenic vein]{REG} and the [IVC graft]{REG} on the [IHIVC]{REG}
Transfer the [solution]{REG} with {pasteur pipette}[Device] into the [vials]{Container}
Pour [10 mL of TBS (Tris-buffered saline) buffer]{Volume} into the petri dish.
Add [500 mM Tris-HCl solution]{Concentration} to the reaction mixture.
Weigh [60.5 grams of Tris-Cl powder]{Mass} and dissolve it in the solution.
Place the sample in an incubator set at [10 degrees Celsius]{Temperature}.
Apply a [200 volt]{Voltage} electrical current to the circuit.
Measure the length of the object using a ruler, it is approximately [10 centimeters]{Length}.
Apply a centrifugal force of [16,000 times gravity]{Force} to separate the components.
The signal has a frequency of [4,000 hertz]{Frequency}.
